title: Cafe Analytics: Sales Trends & Demand Forecasting
blurb: Analyzed over 140,000 point-of-sale transactions for a NYC café using Python (Pandas, Matplotlib, forecasting models) to identify revenue patterns, optimize product mix, and forecast demand for data-driven pricing and inventory decisions.

title: Ziina Purple: Fintech Subscription
blurb: Designed a go-to-market strategy for Ziina, a UAE-based peer-to-peer payments app, analyzing fintech trends, defining benefits, and integrating the Ziina Card.

title: First Goal Impact Analysis: La Liga 2023–24
blurb: Analyzed 300+ La Liga matches to study how scoring first affects win probability. Built predictive models using Python (Logistic Regression, Decision Trees, Random Forest) and used clustering to profile team strategies.
